Package org.dkr.graph.algo.centrality

Class PageRank<K>

java.lang.Object
org.dkr.graph.algo.centrality.PageRank<K>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​Double,​Double,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​Double>>>
public class PageRank<K> extends Object implements org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​Double,​Double,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​Double>>>
The PageRank algorithm compute pagerank values PR(i) for every vertex i. This step will keep executing until convergence.

PR(i) = (1 - a) / N + a * Sigma(PR(j) / Out(j)).

a is user-specified parameter and N is the number of vertices.

PR(i) are initialized as 1 / N and Out(i) is the out-degree of vertex i.
